org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.weightnoise

Class DropConnect

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.weightnoise.DropConnect
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, IWeightNoise

    public class DropConnect
extends java.lang.Object
implements IWeightNoise
    DropConnect, based on Wan et. al 2013 - "Regularization of Neural Networks using DropConnect"
    Sets weights randomly to 0 with some probability, or leaves them unchanged.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
